animals.title: Little Sally's Little Alligator
animals.description: Little Sally's alligator Gerald needs a new tail or he'll die.

animals.title: My Neighbor's bird
animals.description: The guys next door have a bird that screams all night. I need money to hire a bird hitman.

animals.title: Cat in a tree
animals.descrition: There's a cat in a tree. You've seen it before. It's not that special.

educations.title: I wanna go to Harvard. Or PCC.
educations.description: Please help. I'm a poor little boy with no future unless you pay for me to go to college.

educations.title: School is for fools
educations.description: Give me money. Maybe I'll go to school... maybe I won't.
